name: UpdatePipelineInCrm
description:
Partially update a pipeline in the CRM.

Use this tool to perform a partial update of a pipeline identified by its pipeline ID within a specified object type in the CRM. The tool will return the updated pipeline details.

parameters.name: crm_object_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of CRM object (e.g., deals, tickets) to update the pipeline for.

parameters.name: pipeline_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the pipeline to be updated. This is required to specify which pipeline to modify.

parameters.name: pipeline_display_order
parameters.description: The display order number to determine the position of the pipeline in the CRM. Pipelines with the same display order are sorted alphabetically by label.

value_schema.description: The order for displaying this pipeline. If two pipelines have a matching `displayOrder`, they will be sorted alphabetically by label.

parameters.name: pipeline_label
parameters.description: A unique label to organize and identify the pipeline within HubSpot's UI.

value_schema.description: A unique label used to organize pipelines in HubSpot's UI

parameters.name: validate_references_before_deletion
parameters.description: Set to true to validate references before deletion.

parameters.name: validate_deal_stage_usages_before_delete
parameters.description: Indicate if deal stage usages should be validated before deletion. A boolean value is expected.

parameters.name: is_pipeline_archived
parameters.description: Set to true if the pipeline is currently archived and you intend to restore it. Use only for restoration calls.

value_schema.description: Whether the pipeline is archived. This property should only be provided when restoring an archived pipeline. If it's provided in any other call, the request will fail and a `400 Bad Request` will be returned.
